abstract.t: This document describes RESTful EPP (REPP), a data format agnostic, REST based Application Programming Interface (API) for the Extensible Provisioning Protocol [RFC5730]. REPP enables the development of a stateless and scalable EPP service. This document includes a mapping of [RFC5730] [XML] EPP commands to a RESTful HTTP based interface. Existing semantics as defined in [RFC5731], [RFC5732] and [RFC5733] are retained and reused in RESTful EPP.
